article.title: Air Force Awards Raytheon $77 Million Contract for Infrared-Guided Maverick Missiles
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force awarded Raytheon Company a $77.4 million Foreign Military Sales contract to produce AGM-65D and AGM-65G2 infrared-guided Maverick air-to-surface missiles for Korea and Taiwan.
